block_condition.description: If specified, only blocks that fulfill this condition are affected.
block_condition.markdownDescription: If specified, only blocks that fulfill this condition are affected.

allow.description: Determines whether the player is be able to harvest the block.
allow.markdownDescription: Determines whether the player is be able to harvest the block.

type.description:
[Power Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/modify_harvest)

Modifies whether a player is able to harvest a block or not (= receive the block drops).

Type ID: `origins:modify_harvest`
